author: Andy Blatchford
title: Couple flees to north of the Arctic Circle in bid to escape Covid-19
description: "Our community ... is not a life raft for the rest of the world," said Dana Tizya-Tramm, chief of the Vuntut Gwitchin.
content:
The long-distance effort to escape the pandemic occurred at a time when government authorities around the world, including in Canada, are urging people to avoid nonessential travel.
In particular, governments have called on people to stay away from rural are… [+2526 chars]
